pages.text:
Community News and Events
Avery Acres
A +55 Community
NEWS AND EVENTS
As of July 2021 the Community is under new ownership.
New fencing has been installed at the Community entrance, and the dumpster area improved.
The road has been resurfaced soon and the speed bumps at the entrance to the Community and at the Clubhouse have been raised.
New signage for the entrance is in the works and expected after the New Year.
Please remember that the dumpster is not for bulk items like furniture or debris from home renovation projects.
Please check back for news and events
GET IN TOUCH
Reasonable accommodations for people with disabilities will be provided upon request. We are an equal housing opportunity provider.
E-Mail: Michael@cornerstonecommunities.co
Phone/Text: 321.615.3111
Twitter
Instagram
LinkedIn

About Avery Acres
Circa 1946
Avery Acres was initially a livestock farm long before the City developed around it
.
In 1946 the farm was converted to a Manufactured Home Community.
A Mr. Avery founded the Community hence the name Avery Acres.
Avery Acres is a +55 age restricted Community. All homes are owned by the residents and many have been with us long enough to see great change take place in the City. We are located in the center of St. Petersburg close shopping, several major hospitals, and all the attractions St. Petersburg has to offer. Meet your neighbors at the Clubhouse for an event or challenge your friend to a game of shuffleboard. We invite you to come and pass the time with us.
Avery Acres Rules and Regulations
AVERY ACRES.RULES AND REGULATIONS

Reasonable accommodations for people with disabilities will be provided upon request. We are an equal housing opportunity provider.
